email_text:
Subject: Your Delta Airlines Itinerary Confirmation

Dear [Passenger's Name],

Thank you for choosing Delta Airlines for your upcoming trip. Below is your itinerary confirmation for your upcoming flight:

Flight Details:
- Departure City: New York (JFK)
- Arrival City: Los Angeles (LAX)
- Departure Date: October 15, 2021
- Departure Time: 9:00 AM
- Arrival Time: 12:30 PM
- Flight Number: DL1234
- Seat Number: 12A
- Aircraft: Boeing 737

Please check-in for your flight by clicking on the following link: [Check-in Link]

We recommend that you arrive at the airport at least 2 hours before your scheduled departure time to allow enough time for check-in and security screening.

If you have any questions or need assistance with your booking, please do not hesitate to contact our customer service team at 1-800-555-1234.

Thank you for flying with Delta Airlines. We look forward to welcoming you on board.

Sincerely,
Delta Airlines Team
